core.header.lock.tooltip: You do not have all the necessary permissions for full functionality

core.notfound.title: Page not found
core.notfound.message: There is no page available under the path {{param}}.

core.redirect.title: Confirm redirection to external site
core.redirect.message: You will be redirected to '{{param}}'. This could be a security issue. You should only continue if you have no concerns about this site.

core.permissions.noPermissions: You do not have the required permissions

core.login.title: Login
core.login.dontTurnOff: Do not switch off the device
core.login.restartHint: The device might restart several times
core.login.applySetupWithWarnings: Restore operation successful, but with warnings
core.login.applySetupReportHint: Details are available under 'Settings - Backup & Restore - ... - Report'.

core.unsavedMessage.title: Unsaved changes on {{param}}
core.unsavedMessage.descSave: You can save or discard your changes or cancel to continue editing.
core.unsavedMessage.descNoSave: You can discard your changes or cancel to continue editing.

core.dashboard.errorContent.noPermissions: You do not have the required permissions.
core.dashboard.errorContent.appInitializing: Most likely the app is currently being initialized. This may take a while. This widget refreshes automatically.

core.monitoring.title: Network connection interrupted
core.monitoring.message: Check the network connection (WiFi, cable, router, switches) and restore it. In the case of a virtual control, check whether it is still running and restart it if necessary.

core.timeMismatch.message: The time on the device seems to be set incorrectly. This may cause problems with licenses, certificates and more.
